name: NASR
description:
Protect* Earth!  Earn cash for each near miss!

* NASR is not liable for damages due to accidental asteroid impact.

Join the gig economy for Near-Earth Object Defense!  As a private contractor, you can be your own boss!  Our patented renumeration scheme guarantees income for each Near-Earth object that you deflect away.

"Whew, that was a close one!"  - If it came closer to Earth, you earn more!

WARNING:  This game has online multiplayer, so you might just have to compete with other private space agencies, good luck!

Controls:
- WASD or Arrow keys to move your corporate spacecraft
- Left Mouse click to fire a $10 missile (Did you know, in reality SpaceX spends ~$26 million dollars on each rocket?  Some numbers were adjusted for balance purposes)

Made in C++ using Raylib and NBNet
